content: Westar Energy Inc   the biggest power company in Kansas  has drawn takeover interest from St. Louis-based utility Ameren Corp  as well as an investor consortium  Bloomberg reported on Friday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: Westar Energy draws takeover interest from Ameren: Bloomberg

content: April 8 Westar Energy Inc  the biggest power company in Kansas  has drawn takeover interest from Ameren Corp as well as an investor consortium  Bloomberg reported on Friday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: Westar Energy draws takeover interest from Ameren  investor consortium - Bloomberg

content: * Westar said to attract bid interest from Ameren investor group includes Borealis Infrastructure Canada Pension Plan Investment Board- Bloomberg
name: Ameren Corporation
title: BRIEF-Westar said to attract bid interest from Ameren investor group includes Borealis Infrastructure Canada Pension Plan Investment Board- Bloomberg

content: The Nuclear Regulatory Commission said on Monday it has begun a special inspection at Ameren Corp's 1 190 MW Callaway nuclear plant in Missouri to review the failure of control valves following a reactor shutdown on Aug. 11.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: NRC begins special inspection at Ameren's Callaway nuclear plant in Missouri

content: NEW YORK  July 22 Noranda Aluminum Holding Co  has delayed efforts to ramp up production at its New Madrid  Missouri  smelter due to a sharp decline in aluminum prices  President and CEO Kip Smith said on Wednesday  as the company's quarterly losses widened.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Noranda delays smelter ramp-up due to aluminum price rout

content: NEW YORK  June 2 Noranda Aluminum Holding Corp  will have to seek a new power supplier or negotiate a new contract with Ameren Corp in five years to keep its Missouri smelter running  the latest obstacle for its only primary aluminum plant.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Ameren will not extend Noranda aluminum plant's power contract

content: NEW YORK  June 2 Noranda Aluminum Holding Corp  will have to seek a new power supplier or renegotiate a new contract with Ameren Corp in five years to keep its Missouri smelter running  the latest obstacle for its only primary aluminum plant.
name: Ameren Corporation
title: Ameren will not extend Noranda aluminum plant's power contract
